name: Prefery
body:
Hello, World! 

We will share insights, relevant and unrelevant tech infos around Prefery. 

Some information about us and our setup to let you know what to expect from here on:
* We code in Python and Ruby on Rails, with occasional jQuery and AJAX
* We are big fans of NoSQL databases, but also use MySQL and PostgreSQL
* We use cloud computing services from Amazon Webservices, Heroku and Engine Yard

If that interests you, stay tuned!

For any questions, reach out to us via contact@prefery.com. 

Cheers!
Sebastian
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
